Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Clinton. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Clinton.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Trains Resume Stopping at Clinton Station
ShortDescription: O-Hare-bound Blue Line  trains have resumed making stops at Clinton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: O-Hare-bound Blue Line  trains have resumed making stops at Clinton.
